column4: hey, i was wondering if some of the problems i've been seeing are related to my graphics card/drivers? I have to enable the extra effects in compiz everytime i reboot and yet some of the options just aren't shown in the menu at all. I've also been seeing slightly twitchy videos in firefox
I have a 5750 ati graphics card
do you know the compiz-fusion-plugins-extra package terminal command?
for some reason I think it's attributed to the ATI graphics card because it runs on opengl, and from what i've been hearing that's quite problematic
ati in general is problematic, with linux.  invest in nvidia insted, if you can
